code: import{BASE_PATH,API_KEY,TYPE,DATA_NUMBER}from"./const";export function areaTrip(areaCodeNum,pageNo){return fetch("".concat(BASE_PATH,"/areaBasedList1?serviceKey=").concat(API_KEY,"&").concat(TYPE,"&pageNo=").concat(pageNo,"&numOfRows=").concat(DATA_NUMBER,"&MobileApp=AppTest&MobileOS=ETC&arrange=A&areaCode=").concat(areaCodeNum)).then(function(response){return response.json();});}export function areaTripDetail(contentId){return fetch("".concat(BASE_PATH,"/detailCommon1?").concat(TYPE,"&serviceKey=").concat(API_KEY,"&MobileOS=ETC&MobileApp=AppTest&contentId=").concat(contentId,"&defaultYN=Y&firstImageYN=Y&overviewYN=Y&addrinfoYN=Y")).then(function(response){return response.json();});}export function areaTripIntro(contentId,contentTypeId){return fetch("".concat(BASE_PATH,"/detailIntro1?").concat(TYPE,"&ServiceKey=").concat(API_KEY,"&contentTypeId=").concat(contentTypeId,"&contentId=").concat(contentId,"&MobileOS=ETC&MobileApp=AppTest")).then(function(response){return response.json();});}export function MoreImages(contentId){return fetch("".concat(BASE_PATH,"/detailImage1?_type=json&serviceKey=").concat(API_KEY,"&numOfRows=10&pageNo=1&MobileOS=ETC&MobileApp=AppTest&contentId=").concat(contentId,"&imageYN=Y&subImageYN=Y")).then(function(response){return response.json();});}// http://apis.data.go.kr/B551011/KorService/areaBasedList?numOfRows=10&pageNo=3&MobileOS=ETC&MobileApp=AppTest&ServiceKey=9%2Bmjut77JeCgLpJnD6eoWV7TctBLzXUqwzvjS5DZS4cXBdUNbCP7uYZFMMFwhFHAmVkgOYxFi05sxTE6zqSqKA%3D%3D&_type=json&listYN=Y&arrange=A&contentTypeId=12&areaCode=2
